::Workdone::


We got theses files from a friend..So thank them, as well as us for this release. Source was very nice... Had some movements in 2 place that we saw. The very beginning which we fix by rotating and cutting and the other was a very very 
small movement which you will probably wont even notice. Did the usual TLC and 
sync a friend's line to our release       


::THC JOKE::


Q: How do you know when you have smoked enough pot ?
A: When you start looking around for the directions on how to use the lighter.
